channel.title: Dimensionality Reduction on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Dimensionality Reduction on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Contrastive dimension reduction: when and how?
item.description: This research introduces a hypothesis test and a contrastive dimension estimator to identify unique foreground information in contrastive datasets, advancing the field of dimension reduction.

item.title: Navigating the Effect of Parametrization for Dimensionality Reduction
item.description: ParamRepulsor, a novel parametric dimensionality reduction method, achieves state-of-the-art local structure preservation by mining hard negatives and using a tailored loss function.

item.title: Neuc-MDS: Non-Euclidean Multidimensional Scaling Through Bilinear Forms
item.description: Neuc-MDS: Revolutionizing multidimensional scaling by using bilinear forms for non-Euclidean data, minimizing errors, and resolving the dimensionality paradox!
